message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Think it over carefully, time is literally money!
Let's try 55/45, it's more than fair considering the money's losing value!
Bob, I understand the pressure of time, but 45% was too low. I'll meet you in the middle - 55/45 my way.  It's a fair deal considering the circumstances.
Come on Alice, the money's value is dropping fast! I'll take 58%, it's the best I can offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you 480,000 - take it before it shrinks even further!  This is your last chance for a decent share.
